name: Planbox
description: Planbox offers a full-featured, yet easy to use agile project management tool. Our web-based application (SaaS) allows small teams in companies of all sizes to plan, collaborate and deliver more efficiently…Right out of the box. Planbox is perfect for SCRUM and works well with other project management methodologies.
